review: ********** ** ** *** *** ** *** **** ************* ** *********.My twin pregnancy journey was full of complications and challenges  but under Dr.Manjula's guidance and support I successfully delivered twin babies.I am ever grateful to Dr.Manjula for everything.

Hi my name is Rekha.. mother of 2 kids. I highly recommend Dr Manjula Mam because I am very sensitive and delicate person who was very scared when i conceived first time.. after visiting Dr Manjula I got a positive energy she s very very positive in my first pregnancy in last moment when i was 9 months baby had 2 cord around the neck even then doctor told will try for normal she din make me panic.. but I was scared so selected c section.. during operation also she was keep on communicating with me giving me more strength with her words which made me to plan for another kid within 2 years..by first baby is still 23 months but i delivered second healthy baby on May 16 2024 it's all because of her guidance nd medication. . She guides us in a right way .. I also have seizure disorder with so many complications she made my case very simple.. It's just one week after my second delivery today I m so fit and fine.. only medicine can't do everything doctors behaviour with us also makes lots of changes.. i thank manjula mam for making both my delivery so fruitful and memorable one.. I m always grateful to mam.. I wish her very all the best for her career..
